mapper.select: select a.lesson_no as no, a.lesson_name as name, a.lesson_time as time, a.lesson_description as description, a.lesson_disabled as disabled, a.lesson_req_cnt as reqCnt, a.lesson_quota as quota, a.lesson_reservation as reservation, a.lesson_type as type, a.lesson_date as date, b.user_id as "user.id" b.user_name as "user.name" b.user_type as "user.type" from helf_lesson a, helf_users b where lesson_no = #{value} and a.user_id = b.user_id and b.user_type = 'TRAINER'
